short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tab management extension that unobtrusively stops you from accumulating zombie tabs!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tabulatr is an extension to help make your browsing experience more efficient. The app prevents you from opening multiple tabs of specific websites at one time without getting in the way of your browsing. If you open a tracked site in two separate tabs, Tabulatr will automatically bring the first tab into view and close the second tab, meaning you will never end the day with a bunch of minimized facebook tabs!
